articles.author: Avery Lotz
articles.title: Russia's "brazen" NATO airspace violations head to UN Security Council - Axios
articles.description: European leaders warn the incursions are a calculated escalation of Russia's war in Ukraine.
articles.content: <ul><li>"By openly violating our airspace, Russia is undermining principles that are essential to the security of all UN member states," Estonian Foreign Minister Margus Tsahkna said in a statement S… [+2174 chars]
